product_name: Primal Wear Shanti Bike Jersey - Women's - 2012 Overstock
long_description: With its slightly relaxed fit and super-comfy fabric, the women's Primal Wear Shanti Bike Jersey is perfect for club rides, long tours, mountain biking and commuting. Double-knit polyester fabric wicks sweat off your skin and dries fast. UPF 35 sun protection. Full zipper in front; 3 rear pockets. Primal Wear Shanti Bike Jersey for women has a droptail in back for full coveage. Overstock.
short_description: With its slightly relaxed fit and super-comfy fabric, the women's Primal Wear Shanti Bike Jersey is perfect for club rides, long tours, mountain biking and commuting.
